Posts.Content: hi mandi as a new member of these forums we are starting the journey that you are on. its wonderful to read the posts of people like you who are undergoing similar treatments as those our daughter in law will be undergoing shortly. it gives us so much strengh to read your messages. carry on posting, we will all be with you. xxx
